review.description: Good sushi, good service.   Sushi rice was a little dry the first time I came, but very good the second time.  Creative rolls.   Kind of quiet and not a lot of energy/atmosphere, but a nice place to have less than a block from my apartment!
review.author: Erin E.

review.description: A terrific value -- very good sushi, fast delivery, friendly staff and reasonable prices.
review.author: Ron M.

review.description: Granted, it's not a big deal that they're not own/operated by actual Japanese people (perhaps, Thai), but their ramen noodles were not authentic & accompanied by frozen/can veggies & the gyoza (Japanese fried dumplings) appeared to be deep fried - Big no no!  In short, I experienced better & would not return for kitchen items - Sushi/sashimi - OK.
review.author: Ada C.
